snippet: A man charged with killing three Muslim college students appears to have held his gun to the heads of two victims when he pulled the trigger after shooting the first, according to autopsies.
abstract: Autopsy report shows that Craig Hicks, man charged with killing three Muslim students in Chapel Hill, NC, shot Deah Shaddy Barakat in doorway of apartment and then held gun to heads of victims Yusor Mohammad Abu-Salha and Razan Mohammad Abu-Salah before pulling trigger.
lead_paragraph: A man charged with killing three Muslim college students appears to have held his gun to the heads of two victims when he pulled the trigger after shooting the first, according to autopsies.

headline.main: North Carolina: Autopsy Gives Details in Triple Killing
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Autopsy Gives Details in Triple Killing
